column4: anyone here good with bash? im trying to convert 90 .mts videos with ffmpeg to .mp4's...here is my command...for file in $(ls *.mts);do ffmpeg -i 00081.MTS -acodec libfaac -ab 128k -vcodec libx264 -vpre default -crf 25 -threads 0 -deinterlace $file.mp4;done
but i end up with the error ls: cannot access *.mts: No such file or directory
the ls is uneeded, i believe
